name: Chinedu Babalola
goals: Build scalable web applications used by millions
Contribute to open-source full stack frameworks

Frontend Development.comments: Strong command of React and modern frontend practices.

Backend Development.comments: Capable of building secure and efficient APIs.

Databases.comments: Understands SQL/NoSQL, but needs deeper optimization knowledge.

DevOps.comments: Basic CI/CD knowledge, should improve on container orchestration.

Communication.comments: Clear and effective in team discussions.

Problem-Solving.comments: Quick to debug and design efficient solutions.

Teamwork.comments: Good collaborator, adapts well to agile environments.
